thread.title: Mum-of-three Danielle Lloyd poses just like Beyoncé to show off her new bump after revealing she’s expecting first baby with fiancé Michael O’Neill
thread.title_full: Mum-of-three Danielle Lloyd poses just like Beyoncé to show off her new bump after revealing she’s expecting first baby with fiancé Michael O’Neill

author: lfranklin
title: Mum-of-three Danielle Lloyd poses just like Beyoncé to show off her new bump after revealing she’s expecting first baby with fiancé Michael O’Neill
text:
TV Magazine CAN YOU BEY-LIEVE IT? Mum-of-three Danielle Lloyd poses just like Beyoncé to show off her new bump after revealing she’s expecting first baby with fiancé Michael O’Neill 
The model hopes to finally have a daughter By Lauren Franklin, Showbiz Reporter 13th February 2017, 10:02 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments DANIELLE Lloyd has revealed her baby bump to the world by stripping down to her underwear and a veil in a Beyoncé style photoshoot. 
The 33-year-old proudly cradled her bump as she knelt by a rose bush wall and smiled to the camera in a shoot for OK! magazine. A photo posted by Official Danielle Lloyd (@missdlloyd) on Feb 13, 2017 at 1:37am PST 
This will be the model’s fourth child and first with her fiancé Michael O’Neill, and after having three sons with footballer Jamie O’Hara, she says this time everyone wants a girl. 
Opening up about her boys Archie, five, Harry, four, and two-year-old George, she said: “They really want a sister.” Instagram Danielle’s shoot was an ode to Beyonce 
And if what a psychic predicted comes true, she might just get her girl. 
Danielle told Closer last year: “I bloody better get my girl. 
“I went to see a psychic recently and she said it would be a girl, so we’re thrilled. I can’t cope with another boy. “I already feel sorry for her because she’ll have three crazy brothers. They keep saying to me: ‘Mummy, mummy, when are we having a little sister?’ 
“I wanted to have a baby at the start of the year, but it’s already September – I don’t know where the time has gone.” Alamy Danielle Lloyd with fiance Michael O’Neill 
On Sunday The Sun revealed that Danielle’s baby is due this summer. 
One close friend said: “This is really lovely news for Danielle and Michael. 
“With three boys already, Danielle would love a little girl, but she and Michael will be happy either way. “They kept it a secret when they first found out but Danielle has had her three-month scan and they feel comfortable enough to start letting people know. “The baby is due around June, which is very exciting. And after all the anguish Danielle has been through in recent months — ever since Jamie went on CBB — it’s nice for her to be able to focus on the future.” 
For the full interview and pictures check out this week’s OK! Magazine – out now.
